metadata.title: CVE-2021-46979 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: iio:core: fix ioctl handlers removal Currently ioctl handlers are removedtwice. For the first time during iio_device_unregister() then later oninside iio_device_unregister_eventset() andiio_buffers_free_sysfs_and_mask(). Double free leads to kernel panic. Fixthis by not touching ioctl handlers list directly but rather letting coderesponsible for registration call the matching cleanup routine itself.
